title: Anoush Dastgir
text:
Anoush Dastgir (born 27 November 1989) is an Afghan <a href="association%20football">football</a> manager and retired player, who is the current head coach of both the <a href="Afghanistan%20national%20football%20team">Afghanistan national team</a> and <a href="VV%20DUNO">VV DUNO</a> in <a href="Hoofdklasse">Hoofdklasse</a>.
Early life.
Dastgir, born in <a href="Afghanistan">Afghanistan</a>, grew up in <a href="Pakistan">Pakistan</a> and <a href="India">India</a> due to his father being a political refugee before settling in the <a href="Netherlands">Netherlands</a>.
Coaching career.
Afghanistan.
On July 10, 2018, Dastgir was announced by the <a href="Afghanistan%20Football%20Federation">Afghanistan Football Federation</a> as the new head coach of the <a href="Afghanistan%20national%20football%20team">Afghanistan football team</a> succeeding <a href="Otto%20Pfister">Otto Pfister</a>.
